title: RP Cards
body: Yo did the RP amount decrease for LoL prepaid cards, $25 and $10 ones. I haven't bought one for a year and I remember I used to get 3250 RP for $25 cards but now it gives 2830.

replies.body:
Yes, we did have to make an adjustment to our pricing. Master Mirkinen explains everything in this post here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/MXv9uHnL-rp-adjustment-in-oceania

I hope that gives you a better understanding of the change.
